newsitem.title: USA: Spyglass licenses technology to Intercom.
newsitem.headline: Spyglass licenses technology to Intercom.

text.p: Spyglass Inc said Thursday it licensed its World Wide Web technology to Intercom Inc of Tokyo, a developer of commercial software.
According to Spyglass, Intercom said it will create Japanese-language versions of Spyglass Web technology for use in real-time operating systems for televisions and other home electronic devices.
